about_the_game:
Game

This is a simulation game. The player is a caretaker, and his daily job is to take care of the objects in the warehouse.

Players can interact with objects in the warehouse, but this may be dangerous.

The Demo only provides a tutorial process. Objects will not be randomly generated during the game, and the difficulty will not increase over time.

Players only need to walk to the computer as soon as possible and keep an eye on the surveillance screen, and they can basically pass the level quickly.

Play

Each time it starts, the player needs to quickly arrive at the office, interact with the computer, watch the surveillance screen, and take care of the objects within the specified time.

However, players are overseeing some mysterious objects, and emergencies may occur at any time.

If an emergency occurs, players need to quickly reach the containment room and press the emergency button to eliminate the danger, but they must choose the right button.

Not all of the mysterious objects are dangerous, there are also some interesting objects that can be interacted with or help players.

Players only need to persist for 5 rounds to pass the game test.

This is a simulation game. The player is a caretaker, and his daily job is to take care of the objects in the warehouse.

Players can interact with objects in the warehouse, but this may be dangerous.

The Demo only provides a tutorial process. Objects will not be randomly generated during the game, and the difficulty will not increase over time.

However, players are overseeing some mysterious objects, and emergencies may occur at any time.

If an emergency occurs, players need to quickly reach the containment room and press the emergency button to eliminate the danger, but they must choose the right button.

name: Monitoring Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ‌Intel Core i5 12600KF / AMD Ryzen 5 5600G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ‌Intel Core i5 12600KF / AMD Ryzen 5 5600G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: This is a test, players only need to follow the rules to pass the test safely.
